modName: Anises Hideout - OODRedux Without General Stores
summary: As requested the same hideout with out General Stores master file requirement.
descriptionHtml:
[img]http://static2.nexusmods.com/110/mods/images/40347-1-1376534046.jpg[/img]

[color=green][size=10]Welcome to \"Anise\'s Hideout\" a.k.a. \"OODRedux!\"[/size][/color]
This is a small to medium sized player home with all basic needs (see images below for details) you can attain from killing/looting/pickpocketing Anise for the key. You\'ll notice that you can pick the master-level lock on the trap door, but that only gets you so far. Don\'t forget if you enter Anise\'s Hideout and exit while she still lives she will attack you! Inside you will find an entrance with a hidden switch that opens the cave door. Yes the switch is hidden and yes it\'s quite dark in the entrance! Here\'s the one and only hint I\'ll give you; [color=red]\"Beware the obvious!\"[/color]

[color=green][size=10]Other items of interest are...[/size][/color]
A \"fur pile\" that consists of 5 beds, 2 lay down markers and 3 sit cross-legged markers. Keeping your followers in your hideout (via your favorite follower management mod) makes sleeping in your bed a HUGE SNUGGLE-FEST(pictured below)!!! Or if you prefer to live alone you simply have a massive baller bed all to your self (also pictured below)! There is also a washroom with a toilet... Ok it\'s a bench with a hole in it and a bucket underneath, but you live in a cave! What do you want? Running water? That\'s what the river outside is for! 

[color=green][size=10]Possible Issues...[/size][/color]
Shouldn\'t be any! But if you find something let me know, and I\'ll fix it.

[color=green][size=10]For General Stores version...[/size][/color]

Follow this [URL=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/40347/?]link[/url]!

[color=green][size=12]The Amenities[/size][/color]
